value_i18n.en_US:
Asponte Technology has solved the issue of keeping the content in your source system in sync with your newly deployed Liferay platform.

Using our automated solution, your source CMS environment can be ported directly into your targeted Liferay environment as a true “lift and shift” migration with little to no differences to your end users.

makeSEA lets your business use AR/VR (XR) technology for selling, training and influencing like no other medium can, and features tools for creating live and prerecorded product demos, lessons, exhibits, custom apps and more, with no/low-code publishing, using content that is relevant to your audience.

makeSEA reduces application creation and update effort by 10x-100x as compared to traditional XR publishing tools. It enables co-presence, remote hands support, geo-referenced inspection and audits, parts order and repair, and other universal workflows in AR and VR that apply to most any business and discipline.

The automated exporter integrates with common headless capable CMS tools such as Microsoft Sharepoint, Microsoft Sharepoint Online/Office.com, SiteCore, Adobe Experience Manager, and HCL Digital Experience
Cross-CMS is capable of processing an infinite number of source CMS and portal objects
Retain historical version of documents and content, keeping your CMS within compliance with historical record keeping and allowing the decommissioning of old environments
Automated tooling migrates your source CMS’s content items, binary files (images/documents), and website pages
Cross-CMS is licensed as a one-time purchase with source code or free unlimited usage of our automated tooling during a services engagement.
Automated export/import process updates content items in Liferay when they are updated in the source CMS system, reducing authoring downtime during the migration and cutover windows

Company Profile


Asponte Technology is a dynamic software consulting and development company that specializes in delivering innovative digital solutions to businesses across various industries. With a strong focus on technology and a deep understanding of their clients' needs, Asponte leverages cutting-edge tools and methodologies to create transformative experiences and drive business growth.

With a rich history spanning over two decades, Asponte has established itself as a trusted partner for organizations seeking to enhance their digital capabilities. Their team of highly skilled professionals possesses expertise in a wide range of areas, including enterprise applications, mobile development, cloud computing, and data analytics. Whether it's designing intuitive user interfaces, implementing robust backend systems, or integrating disparate technologies, Asponte Technology delivers innovative solutions that enable businesses to thrive in an increasingly digital world.
